body {
  height: 100%;
  font-weight: 400;
  overflow-x: hidden;
}

table td {
  font-weight: 400;
  font-size: 16px;
}

.md-accordion .card .card-body {
  font-weight: 400;
  font-size: 16px;
}

.link:hover {
  cursor: pointer;
}

h1,
h2, 
h3,
h4,
h5,
h6 {
  font-family: 'Fira Sans', sans-serif !important; 
}


.nav-link {
  text-transform: unset !important;
  font-size: 16px !important;
}

.btn {
  font-size: 17px !important;
  padding: 5px 13px !important;
  text-transform: unset !important;
  box-shadow: none !important;
  border-radius: 5px !important;
}

.btn-sm {
  font-size: 14px !important;
  padding: 3px 10px !important;
  border-radius: 4px !important;
}

.btn-lg {
  font-size: 22px !important;
  padding: 12px 25px !important;
}

.btn-xl {
  font-size: 30px !important;
  padding: 20px 35px !important;
}


.btn-grey {
  color: #354764 !important;
  background: #e0e0e0 !important;
}

.btn-blue-grey {
  background: #B0BEC5 !important;
}

.btn-white {
  color: #354764 !important;
  background-color: #fff !important;
}

.flex-fill {
  flex: 1;
}

.hide-scrollbar {
  -ms-overflow-style: none;  /* Internet Explorer 10+ */
  scrollbar-width: none;  /* Firefox */
}
.hide-scrollbar::-webkit-scrollbar { 
  display: none;  /* Safari and Chrome */
}

.navbar-nav li a {
  line-height: 35px;
  padding: 5px 10px;
}

.text-right {
  text-align: right !important;
}

.vertical-align {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
}

.center-align {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
}

.bg-white {
  background-color: #fff;
}

.bg {
  height: 100%;
  background-position: center;
  background-repeat: no-repeat; 
  background-size: cover;
}

.bg {
  background-image: url("");
}

* { -moz-box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-box-sizing: border-box; box-sizing: border-box; }

.remote-canvas:hover, .remote-canvas:active {
  cursor: url('data:image/x-icon;base64,'), 
  pointer;
}

@media all and (orientation: landscape) {
	canvas {
		display: inline-block;
		margin-right: 0px;
	}
}	

.asteriskField {
  display: none;
}

.note.note-dark {
  background-color: #F2F2F2;
}

.note.note-success {
  background-color: #E8F5E9;
}

.circle-icon {
  color: #fff;
  font-size: 20px;
  background: #79909C;
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  padding-top: 10px !important;
  border-radius: 50%;
  text-align: center;
}

.square-icon {
  color: #fff;
  font-size: 20px;
  background: #79909C;
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  padding-top: 10px !important;
  border-radius: 4px;
  text-align: center;
}

.box {
  position: relative;
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
}

.top-left {
  position: absolute;
  top: 5px;
  left: 6px;
}

.bottom-left {
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 5px;
  left: 6px;
}

.centered {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
}

.rounded-4 {
  border-radius: 10px !important;
}

.rounded-5 {
  border-radius: 15px !important;
}

.bottom {
  position: absolute;
  top: 135px;
  left: 10px;
}

video {
  width: 500px;
  height: 500px;
  object-fit: cover;
}

.overlay {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50;
  left: 50;
  z-index: 1;
}

.prime-spot {
  position: absolute;
  z-index: 10;
}

.fs-7 {
  font-size: 14px;
}

.fs-8 {
  font-size: 13px;
}

.fs-9 {
  font-size: 12px;
}

.fs-10 {
  font-size: 11px;
}

.no-overflow {
  display: inline-block;
  white-space: nowrap;
  position: relative;
  width: 100%;
  margin-right: -1000px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.profile-tab {
  border-radius: 6px;
  padding: 16px 14px 16px 14px;
}

.profile-tab:hover {
  color: #606266;
  background-color: #F2F2F2;
}

.avatar {
  width: 150px !important;
  margin: -40px auto 0;
  border: 3px solid white;
}

.iti {
  width: 100%;
}

.ratio{
  position:relative;
  width: 100%;
  height: 0;
  padding-bottom: 56.2% ; /* % of width, defines aspect ratio*/
  
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-position: center center;
  background-size: cover;  
}

.draw-canvas:hover, .draw-canvas:active {
  cursor: url('data:image/x-icon;base64,'), 
  pointer;
}

@media all and (orientation: landscape) {
	canvas {
		display: inline-block;
		margin-right: 0px;
	}
}	

.zoom-rotate {
  transition: all 1.5s ease;
}

.zoom-rotate:hover {
  transform: scale(2) rotate(0deg);
}

.bg-online {
  background-color: #E0E0E0 !important;
}

.bg-surround {
  background-color: #eee;
}

.bg-page {
  background-color: #fff !important;
}

.bg-card {
  background-color: #FAFAFA !important;
}

.bubble-title {
  background-color:rgb(224,224,224,0.7); 
  color: #000; 
  border-radius:12px; 
  padding: 4px 6px 4px 6px; 
  font-size: 12px;
}

.bubble {
  background-color: #e0e0e0; 
  color: #000; 
  border-radius:12px; 
  padding: 4px 6px 4px 6px; 
  font-size: 12px;
}

.tag {
  background-color: #e0e0e0; 
  color: #000; 
  border-radius:13px; 
  padding: 4px 6px 4px 6px; 
  margin-right: 6px;
  font-size: 13px;
}

.tag-lg {
  background-color: #e0e0e0; 
  color: #000; 
  border-radius:15px; 
  padding: 6px 8px 6px 8px; 
  margin-right: 6px;
  font-size: 15px;
} 

.user-tag {
  background-color: #e0e0e0; 
  color: #000; 
  border-radius:18px; 
  padding-right: 8px; 
  margin: 0px 10px 10px 0px;
  font-size: 16px;
  white-space: nowrap;
  display: inline-block; 
}

@media (prefers-color-scheme: dark) {
    /* 
  121212 darkest
  1c1c1c
  262626  
  303030  
  424242  
  a3a3a3 lightest
  */

  .bubble-title {
    background-color:rgb(28,28,28,0.5); 
    color: #fff; 
    border-radius:12px; 
    padding: 4px 6px 4px 6px; 
    font-size: 12px;
  }
  
  .bubble {
    background-color: #1c1c1c; 
    color: #fff; 
    border-radius:12px; 
    padding: 4px 6px 4px 6px; 
    font-size: 12px;
  }

  .text-muty {
    color: #b9bbbe !important;
  }

  .note-light {
    border-color: #E0E0E0 !important;
    background-color: #E0E0E0 !important;
  }

  .bg-surround {
      background-color: #1c1c1c !important;
  }

  .bg-page {
      background-color: #303030 !important;
  }

  .bg-card {
    background-color: #424242 !important;
  }

  .bg-online {
      background-color: #000 !important;
  }

  .nav-link {
    color: #fff !important;
  }

  .navbar-toggler {
    color: #fff !important;
  }

  .accordion-button {
    color: #fff !important;
  }

  .accordion-header {
    color: #fff !important;
  }

  .card {
    background-color: #303030 !important;
  }

  .iti__country-list {
    background-color: #424242 !important;
  }

  .profile-tab:hover {
    color: #ffffff;
    background-color: #262626;
  }
}
